meaning: To reach its highest or lowest altitude.
To reach its highest point or climax; result (in)
To bring to its climax; cap.
To reach the highest point above an observer's horizon. Used of stars and other celestial bodies.
sentences: The day will culminate with a presentation to members of Parliament.
The series of topics will culminate in an exhibition later in the year.
